title: Business Analytics SQL Project
description: A portfolio-ready SQL analytics project that simulates a real-world sales database. The project demonstrates data modeling, advanced SQL querying and business insight generation using PostgreSQL. It answers key business questions around revenue growth, customer lifetime value and retention through cohort analysis.
highlights: Designed a relational data model optimized for analytical queries
Built advanced SQL analyses including cohort-based customer retention
Translated raw query results into actionable business insights
